element.item: To convert from longitude and latitude in degrees (o), minutes ('), seconds (''), and a hemisphere (North or South and East or West) to decimal degrees, the following formula should be used: do m' s''=h *(d+m/ 60+s/3600) where h=1 for the Northern and Eastern hemispheres and –1 for the Southern and Western hemispheres i.e. 30o30'0'' S= –30.5 and 30o15'55'' N=30.265.
